body: T'was really good... Also really?? 7 fucking years ago??? Idk lol I read the afterword like he was just talking about the events, just happened recently. Hmmmm...
This thing was literally uploaded 7years ago in English... the reposts on this site are getting worse and worse.
Maybe it's just me but some characters bodies look kind of weird in some page's
